verbose_text: Cocaine mobilizes 2-AG via inhibition of norepinephrine uptake and promotion of a cooperative interaction between G q/11 -coupled type-1 metabotropic glutamate and alpha 1 -adrenergic receptors to stimulate internal calcium stores and activate phospholipase C.
evidence: Cocaine mobilizes 2-AG via inhibition of norepinephrine uptake and promotion of a cooperative interaction between G q/11 -coupled type-1 metabotropic glutamate and alpha 1 -adrenergic receptors to stimulate internal calcium stores and activate phospholipase C.
